caption.p: Acacia longifolia flower cover/m 2 in selected sites representing the different situations. SD2 and SD3, peak of the flowering season; SD4, post-peak season; PF2, A. longifolia in the understory of the pine forest. Areas fully covered with flowers correspond to red; areas with only a few flowers are showed in blue. Flower cover/m 2 in all sites may be observed on the Supplementary Figures S5â€“ S8 . Name of study sites as in Figure 2 .
